description: Returns a Timestream for InfluxDB DB parameter group.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The id of the DB parameter group.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: A service-generated unique identifier.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The customer-supplied name that uniquely identifies the DB parameter group when interacting with the Amazon Timestream for InfluxDB API and CLI commands.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the DB parameter group.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description of the DB parameter group.

nested_items.name: parameters
nested_items.description: The parameters that comprise the DB parameter group.

nested_items.name: InfluxDBv2
nested_items.description: All the customer-modifiable InfluxDB v2 parameters in Timestream for InfluxDB.

nested_items.name: fluxLogEnabled
nested_items.description: Include option to show detailed logs for Flux queries.

nested_items.name: logLevel
nested_items.description: Log output level. InfluxDB outputs log entries with severity levels greater than or equal to the level specified.

nested_items.name: noTasks
nested_items.description: Disable the task scheduler. If problematic tasks prevent InfluxDB from starting, use this option to start InfluxDB without scheduling or executing tasks.

nested_items.name: queryConcurrency
nested_items.description: Number of queries allowed to execute concurrently. Setting to 0 allows an unlimited number of concurrent queries.

nested_items.name: queryQueueSize
nested_items.description: Maximum number of queries allowed in execution queue. When queue limit is reached, new queries are rejected. Setting to 0 allows an unlimited number of queries in the queue.

nested_items.name: tracingType
nested_items.description: Enable tracing in InfluxDB and specifies the tracing type. Tracing is disabled by default.

nested_items.name: metricsDisabled
nested_items.description: Disable the HTTP /metrics endpoint which exposes internal InfluxDB metrics.

nested_items.name: httpIdleTimeout
nested_items.description: Maximum duration the server should keep established connections alive while waiting for new requests. Set to 0 for no timeout.

nested_items.name: durationType
nested_items.description: The type of duration for InfluxDB parameters.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of duration for InfluxDB parameters.

nested_items.name: httpReadHeaderTimeout
nested_items.description: Maximum duration the server should try to read HTTP headers for new requests. Set to 0 for no timeout.

nested_items.name: durationType
nested_items.description: The type of duration for InfluxDB parameters.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of duration for InfluxDB parameters.

nested_items.name: httpReadTimeout
nested_items.description: Maximum duration the server should try to read the entirety of new requests. Set to 0 for no timeout.

nested_items.name: durationType
nested_items.description: The type of duration for InfluxDB parameters.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of duration for InfluxDB parameters.

nested_items.name: httpWriteTimeout
nested_items.description: Maximum duration the server should spend processing and responding to write requests. Set to 0 for no timeout.

nested_items.name: durationType
nested_items.description: The type of duration for InfluxDB parameters.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of duration for InfluxDB parameters.

nested_items.name: influxqlMaxSelectBuckets
nested_items.description: Maximum number of group by time buckets a SELECT statement can create. 0 allows an unlimited number of buckets.

nested_items.name: influxqlMaxSelectPoint
nested_items.description: Maximum number of points a SELECT statement can process. 0 allows an unlimited number of points. InfluxDB checks the point count every second (so queries exceeding the maximum aren't immediately aborted).

nested_items.name: influxqlMaxSelectSeries
nested_items.description: Maximum number of series a SELECT statement can return. 0 allows an unlimited number of series.

nested_items.name: pprofDisabled
nested_items.description: Disable the /debug/pprof HTTP endpoint. This endpoint provides runtime profiling data and can be helpful when debugging.

nested_items.name: queryInitialMemoryBytes
nested_items.description: Initial bytes of memory allocated for a query.

nested_items.name: queryMaxMemoryBytes
nested_items.description: Maximum number of queries allowed in execution queue. When queue limit is reached, new queries are rejected. Setting to 0 allows an unlimited number of queries in the queue.

nested_items.name: queryMemoryBytes
nested_items.description: Maximum bytes of memory allowed for a single query. Must be greater or equal to queryInitialMemoryBytes.

nested_items.name: sessionLength
nested_items.description: Specifies the Time to Live (TTL) in minutes for newly created user sessions.

nested_items.name: sessionRenewDisabled
nested_items.description: Disables automatically extending a user's session TTL on each request. By default, every request sets the session's expiration time to five minutes from now. When disabled, sessions expire after the specified session length and the user is redirected to the login page, even if recently active.

nested_items.name: storageCacheMaxMemorySize
nested_items.description: Maximum size (in bytes) a shard's cache can reach before it starts rejecting writes. Must be greater than storageCacheSnapShotMemorySize and lower than instance's total memory capacity. We recommend setting it to below 15% of the total memory capacity.

nested_items.name: storageCacheSnapshotMemorySize
nested_items.description: at which the storage engine will snapshot the cache and write it to a TSM file to make more memory available. Must not be greater than storageCacheMaxMemorySize.

nested_items.name: storageCacheSnapshotWriteColdDuration
nested_items.description: Duration at which the storage engine will snapshot the cache and write it to a new TSM file if the shard hasn't received writes or deletes.

nested_items.name: durationType
nested_items.description: The type of duration for InfluxDB parameters.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of duration for InfluxDB parameters.

nested_items.name: storageCompactFullWriteColdDuration
nested_items.description: Duration at which the storage engine will compact all TSM files in a shard if it hasn't received writes or deletes.

nested_items.name: durationType
nested_items.description: The type of duration for InfluxDB parameters.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of duration for InfluxDB parameters.

nested_items.name: storageCompactThroughputBurst
nested_items.description: Rate limit (in bytes per second) that TSM compactions can write to disk.

nested_items.name: storageMaxConcurrentCompactions
nested_items.description: Maximum number of full and level compactions that can run concurrently. A value of 0 results in 50% of runtime.GOMAXPROCS(0) used at runtime. Any number greater than zero limits compactions to that value. This setting does not apply to cache snapshotting.

nested_items.name: storageMaxIndexLogFileSize
nested_items.description: at which an index write-ahead log (WAL) file will compact into an index file. Lower sizes will cause log files to be compacted more quickly and result in lower heap usage at the expense of write throughput.

nested_items.name: storageNoValidateFieldSize
nested_items.description: Skip field size validation on incoming write requests.

nested_items.name: storageRetentionCheckInterval
nested_items.description: Interval of retention policy enforcement checks. Must be greater than 0.

nested_items.name: durationType
nested_items.description: The type of duration for InfluxDB parameters.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of duration for InfluxDB parameters.

nested_items.name: storageSeriesFileMaxConcurrentSnapshotCompactions
nested_items.description: Maximum number of snapshot compactions that can run concurrently across all series partitions in a database.

nested_items.name: storageSeriesIdSetCacheSize
nested_items.description: Size of the internal cache used in the TSI index to store previously calculated series results. Cached results are returned quickly rather than needing to be recalculated when a subsequent query with the same tag key/value predicate is executed. Setting this value to 0 will disable the cache and may decrease query performance.

nested_items.name: storageWalMaxConcurrentWrites
nested_items.description: Maximum number writes to the WAL directory to attempt at the same time. Setting this value to 0 results in number of processing units available x2.

nested_items.name: storageWalMaxWriteDelay
nested_items.description: Maximum amount of time a write request to the WAL directory will wait when the maximum number of concurrent active writes to the WAL directory has been met. Set to 0 to disable the timeout.

nested_items.name: durationType
nested_items.description: The type of duration for InfluxDB parameters.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of duration for InfluxDB parameters.

nested_items.name: uiDisabled
nested_items.description: Disable the InfluxDB user interface (UI). The UI is enabled by default.
